headline: Does BEN’s Apera Deal Signal a New Chapter for Franklin’s Alternative Credit Ambitions?
summary: Franklin Resources recently completed its acquisition of Apera Asset Management, expanding its alternative credit and direct lending presence in Europe while updating assets under management to US$1.66 trillion as of September 2025, driven by positive market performance despite continued net outflows at its Western Asset Management division. This move strengthens Franklin’s global alternative platform and signals ongoing efforts to diversify its asset base beyond traditional products, even...
